headline: Global Money Chases World’s Hottest Major Stock Market in Korea
summary: (Bloomberg) -- South Korean stocks, already this year’s best performers among the world’s major markets, are becoming a magnet for foreign investors as bold regulatory reforms to lift valuations and empower minority shareholders gain traction.Most Read from BloombergThe High Costs of Trump’s ‘Big Beautiful’ New Car Loan DeductionCan This Bridge Ease the Troubled US-Canadian Relationship?Trump Administration Sues NYC Over Sanctuary City PolicyJust this month, policymakers voted in favor of pivota

headline: Rising Fiscal Deficits Drive Billions Into Credit
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Investors are showing signs of pulling money out of government bonds and plowing it into US and European company debt. headline: Citigroup: It Is Not Too Late To Invest
summary: Citi's strategy overhaul under Jane Fraser focuses on capital efficiency, buybacks, and value growth. Click to read more on why C remains an attractive opportunity.
